comment.author: 63441216@N08
comment._content: Trying to pinpoint the exact location by the mountains in the background, and am not entirely sure this is Alupka. I know the caption says so, but I've been there over a dozen of times and took hundreds of photos in that area including from a boat.

comment.author: 63441216@N08
comment._content: But this is definitely close. I think it might be past Alupka going East, closer to Yalta.
